name: Linda Allred
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can introduce strategic partnership and collaborative growth opportunities aligned with her professional service offering. Limited data suggests openness to referral-based relationships with complementary service providers.
what_you_do: Linda Allred is a best-selling author who focuses on helping people overcome bad habits and limiting beliefs.
who_you_serve: Linda Allred serves individuals seeking to transform their lives and achieve lasting happiness.
social_proof: Linda Allred was honored with the Quilly Award for her book Journey to Lasting Happiness. She is also a best-selling author.
business_focus: Linda Allred is a best-selling author who helps people overcome bad habits and limiting beliefs to achieve lasting happiness.
